needles 400-­ yards/100gr-­ briar sock dark forest us 1 5/2 5mm circulars/dpns 87-­ yds/20gr briar mini skein or size needle to get gauge cuff cast on 64 stitches using your preferred cast on divide your stitches with your circular needles by 32 stitches on n1 and 32 stitiches on n2 k2 p2 to end of round repeat this ribbing for your preferred length the sample was knit with 16 rounds of ribbing next round is set up as follows right leg k1 place stitch marker first row of chart place stitch marker knit to end of round 12 stitches between stitch markers left leg knit to last 13 stitches place stitch marker first row of chart place stitch marker k1 knit to end of round 12 stitches between stitch markers continue knitting your leg working chart in between stitch markers until you get to your preferred length heel knit across n1 in pattern and begin heel with right side facing you on n2 the instep stitches will be left on hold on n1 until the heel flap and turn are complete the heel flap stitches are worked flat back and forth on n2 the first 2 and last 2 stitches are always knit on every row repeat these 4 row until you have 16 purl ridges/bumps on heel flap sides row 1 rs k2 *slip 1 k1* to last 2 stitches k2 turn row 2 ws k2 purl to last 2 k2 turn row 3 rs k2 *k1 slip 1* to last 2 stitches k2 turn row 4 ws k2 purl to last 2 k2 turn heel turn with right side facing you you will now use short row to turn the heel as follows row 1 rs slip 1 knit 18 ssk k1 turn row 2 ws slip 1 p7 p2tog p1 turn row 3 rs slip 1 knit to 1 stitch before gap ssk k1 turn row 4 ws slip 1 purl to 1 stitch before gap p2tog p1 turn repeat row 3 & 4 until all stitches have been worked knit across heel stitches and pick up 16 stitches along heel flap i pick up the stitches in between the purl bumps underneath 2 strings of yarn rejoin and knit across n1 in pattern and pick up stitches again on n2 knit to middle of heel turn stitches and this will be your new beginning of round place a marker knit to 3 stitches before end of n2 k2tog k1 knit across n1 in pattern on n2 k1 ssk knit to end of round one decrease round complete next round is n2 knit n1 in pattern repeat these decrease rounds until you have reached 32 stitches on n2 knit foot until
